<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b8554304c3673b081e9b5996f009fd0e4307e482|patch 8.2.2519: Vim9: no reason to keep strange Vi behavior>
patch 8.2.2519: Vim9: no reason to keep strange Vi behavior

Problem:    Vim9: no reason to keep strange Vi behavior.
Solution:   ":3" and ":3|" both go to line 3. ":|" does not print the line.
            (closes #7840)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2519: Vim9: no reason to keep strange Vi behavior 路 vim/vim@b855430
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2519: Vim9: no reason to keep strange Vi behavior 路 vim/vim@b855430
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no reason to keep strange Vi behavior. Solution: ":3" and ":3|" both go to line 3. ":|" does not print the line. (closes #7840)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/eed9d46293f0842aad0d50ff3a526f9a48b12421|patch 8.2.2518: 'listchars' should be window-local>
patch 8.2.2518: 'listchars' should be window-local

Problem:    'listchars' should be window-local.
Solution:   Make 'listchars' global-local. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, Marco Hinz,
            closes #5206, closes #7850)
